com.hybris.cis.common.ws

Class Wss4jUserAndPasswordHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.common.ws.Wss4jUserAndPasswordHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler

    public class Wss4jUserAndPasswordHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler
    Implementation of a ClientInterceptor and CallbackHandler to dynamically provide user name and password with the support of a Wss4jUserAndPasswordHandler.Wss4jCredentialsProvider.
